meta.name: description
meta.content: Our goal is for all Nampa School District students to meet or exceed high academic standards by acquiring the knowledge and skills essential for success on state and national assessments, and in post-secondary education, the world of work, and citizenship.

h2.b: We recognize the value of the arts

div.div: The National Speech & Debate Association cited his exemplary volunteerism to promote speech and debate.

h3.a: Rep. Youngblood Walks for Nampa Schools

div.div: The Idaho lawmaker earned $750 for NSD in the Blue Cross of Idaho Foundation's Steps for School program.

h3.a: Classrooms Closed; Online Learning, Sack Lunches a Go

div.div: Grab-and-Go lunches available starting March 30; online instruction begins March 31.

h3.a: Nampa Students Excel at FCCLA Awards

div.div: Also named Idaho FCCLA Exemplary Chapter.

h3.a: April School Board to Meet Via Zoom

div.div: The April 14 meeting will be virtual in keeping with the governor's stay-at-home order.

h3.a: NSD Schools Remain Closed through April 3

video.alt: Students and staff thank voters for approving a levy in support of our schools.

div.div: Location: District Office Board Room, 619 S. Canyon St.
